refnamediv.refpurpose: Convert frequency unit of the frequency domain data

listitem.para: a matrix of double, represents the frequency response points of systems
a string , represents the changed frequency unit . The new frequency units are rad/Timeunit,cycles/TimeUnit,rad/s,kHz,MHz,GHz,rpm,. The default frequency unit is rad/TimeUnit.
a matrix of double, represents the update frequency response points of systems

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: sysfreq = chgFreqUnit(sys,changedfrequnit) updated frequency unit of the sys. The response at corresponding point will be same.
Example sys = frd(1:10,1:10) sysfreq = chgFreqUnit(sys,'Khz') sysfreq1 = chgFreqUnit(sys,'rpm')
